subject: Claims of the Concessionaires/ Contractors in the ongoing BOTEPC projects
text: HTrf <cflu (THIf glfatr<ut TH /Phone: 91-11-25074100/25074200 (er 5ae7t 3r rotii Fi7q4) 447 /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 TT #T HT TT National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) j1-5 Qa 6, #er-10 , EIaT; frit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10. Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn 30th July, 2012 POLCY MATTERS-TECHNICAL (110/2012) (Decision taken on FileNo 10411218/2007-Admnl Sub: Claims of the Concessionaires/Contractors in the ongoing BO/EPC Projects: It has been observed in one of the case that information regarding the claims of the Concessionaire submitted to the Independent Engineer with copy to Project Director, was given to NHAI HQ after & substantial period of time. The Competent Authority has viewed the matter seriously: 2. In view of above, it has been decided that in future, the Project Directors of all the Project Implementation Units will have to inform regarding the claims of the Concessionaires/ Contractors in the ongoing BOT/EPC Projects, aS applicable, to NHAI HQ along with their preliminary comments within 4 week from the receipt of such claims, if any. 3 This issues with the approval of Chairman: 30 (V.K.Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord /LA) To, AlLofficers and employees of HQ/ZO[ROs[PIUs[CMUs[Site Olfces NHAL
